title: Canadian Affair's latest sale has 10% off Canada holidays but be quick
text:

Canadian Affair is giving holidaymakers the perfect excuse to book that dream holiday to Canada with its latest sale.

The travel firm has slashed prices by up to 10 per cent across heaps of holidays, and there are plenty of tempting deals for intrepid explorers.

That's because the sale includes a wide array of holiday types including rail, cruise, motorhome, self-drive and escorted tour holidays.

The deals are valid on bookings made over the phone for holidays with a minimum of three nights spent in Canada.

You'll need to book by 9pm on the 31st October 2019 when the sale ends, but of course it's worth noting that the cheapest holidays are subject to availability.

Although the discounts won't be applied on holidays booked online, the Canadian Affair website has a full list of Canada holidays included to give you plenty of inspiration.

(Image: Getty)

They've also got dedicated sections for Cruise holiday , City breaks , Escorted tour holidays , Motorhome holidays , Rail holidays , Ski holidays . There are even Wildlife holidays on offer if you're keen to seek out some bears or go whale-watching.

There are some pretty tempting deals on offer too.

For example, you could bag a 15-night Best of Canada's West Motorhome Holiday from £777pp (down from £863pp) which works out at approximately £51 a day. That includes your motorhome rental, one night pre-accommodation in Vancouver AND your return flights.

Not sure where you'd want to go first? We've got plenty of Canadian destination guides to hotspots such as Toronto , Ottawa , Alberta , Halifax and British Columbia with top tips on the best things to see and do while you're there.

We also asked Air Transat's cabin crew to share their insider tips on their favourite Canadian cities.

You can view the full terms and conditions here for the Canadian Affair sale.
description: Canadian Affair has launched a huge sale with discounts of 10 per cent off heaps of holidays including rail, cruise and escorted tours
